"Jesus Kraest: "Dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia mu dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Hwɛ
ne nsɛmpa no ahyɛse.": morosoma mo bɔfoe ma oeedzi w'enyim kan

"Jesus Kraest: "Obi ne ndze retsea mu wɔ sar no do dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan

"Jesus Kraest: "John bae bonumae wɔ sar no do na ɔpaa mu kaa nnuho enuma a ɔdze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu no ho asɛm."
"Na Judea man nyina
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na Jerusalɛmfo nyina puee kɔr no hɔ kɛkaa hɔn bɔn
ne nsɛmpa no ahyɛse.": na onumaa hɔn wɔ Esutsen Jordan mu."

"Jesus Kraest: "Nna John fura efupɔnkɔnhwi tam na nwoma abɔdo bɔ n'asen
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na odzi mbɛbɛw na kwaa mu ewo."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔpaa mu kaa dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Obi a no ho yɛ dzen kyɛn me dzi m'ekyir reba a no nsokota ho ahoma mpo mennsɛ dɛ mobɔkotow masan."

"Jesus Kraest: "Emi dze
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: munumaa hom nsu mu
column6: obonuma hom wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu no Jesus fii Galilii Nazarɛt bae
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na John numaa no wɔ Esutsen Jordan mu."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ntsɛmara a ofi nsu no mu reba no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ohun dɛ sor apaa ebien na Sunsum no tse dɛ ebubur risian ba no do:"

"Jesus Kraest: "na ndze bi fii sor baa dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Ɔwo nye mo Dɔba a esɔ m'enyi."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na amonmu hɔ ara na Sunsum no faa no ɔhardo kɔr sar no do."
"Na odzii sar no do hɔ adaduanan
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ma Satan sɔɔ no hwɛe; nna ɔnye hambowa wɔ hɔ; na abɔfo no soom no."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na afei woyii John mae no ekyir no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Jesus baa Galilii bɛkaa Nyankopɔn ho asɛmpa no
column6: "Aber no aso na Nyankopɔn ahenman no abɛn: hom nnu homho
column7: na hom ngye asɛmpa no ndzi."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔnenam Galilii po ho no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ohun Simon nye Simon no nua Andrew dɛ wɔrotow eboa wɔ po mu

"Jesus Kraest: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Hom mbedzi m'ekyir na mebɛma hom ayɛ nyimpa enufo."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ntsɛmara wɔdaan eboa no gyaae na wobedzii n'ekyir."
"Na ɔkɔr enyim kakra no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ohun James
"#1.1 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi mmfa Nyank: ɔnye no nua John a hɔn so wɔwɔ hɛn mu resa hɔn mboa."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ntsɛmara ɔfrɛɛ hɔn; na wɔdaan hɔn egya Zebedee nye apaafo no gyaa hɛn no mu
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na wokedzii n'ekyir."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na wɔkɔr Karpernaum; na ntsɛmara ahomgyeda no ɔkɛhɛɛn nhyiamudan no mu kɛkyerɛkyerɛe."
"Na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛɛ hɔn ahobow
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: osiandɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ nyia ɔwɔ tum

"Jesus Kraest: "Ber no ara mu no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: nna nyimpa bi wɔ nhyiamudan no mu a ɔwɔ sunsum fi;"

"Jesus Kraest: "na ɔtseaa mu see dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Ebɛnadze na yɛnye wo wɔ yɛ
ne nsɛmpa no ahyɛse.": Jesus Nazarɛtnyi? Ana ebae dɛ erebɛsɛɛ hɛn? Minyim wo nyimpa ban

"Jesus Kraest: "Na Jesus bɔɔ no ham dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Ka w'ano to mu

"Jesus Kraest: "Na sunsum fi no twaa no hwee hɔ na ɔkaa mu kɛse fii no mu firii."
"Na hɔn nyina ho boow hɔn ara ma wobisabisaa hɔnho dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Ebɛnadze nye yi? Nkyerɛkyerɛ fofor bɛn a! Ɔdze tum hyɛ esunsum fi mpo

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ntsɛmara ne nka tahyee ɔman a etwa Galilii ho nyina mu."
"Na ntsɛmara wofii nhyiamudan no mu firii no wɔbaa Simon nye Andrew fie
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: wɔnye James nye John."

"Jesus Kraest: "Nna Simon n'asew da hɔ yar papu; na ntsɛmara wɔkaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no;"
"na Jesus kosuoo ne nsamu maa no do; na papu no fii no do
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na ɔhyɛɛ ase soom hɔn."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ewimbir a ewia kɔtɔree no wɔdze hɔn a wɔyaryar na hɔn a mbɔnsam afa hɔn nyina brɛɛ no."
"Na kurow no nyina behyiaa mu wɔ abow no ano."
"Na ɔsaa dodowara a wɔwɔ nyarba horow no yarba
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na otuu mbɔnsam pii; na ɔamma mbɔnsam no kwan dɛ wɔnkasa

"Jesus Kraest: "Na anapaatu
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ansaana adze rebɛkye no
ne nsɛmpa no ahyɛse.": ɔsoɛree na opuei kɔr sar bi do

"Jesus Kraest: "Na Simon nye hɔn a wɔka no ho no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: tsiiw no;"

"Jesus Kraest: "na wohun no na wɔsee no dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Nyimpa nyina rohwehwɛ wo."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: Hom mma yɛnkɔ nkurow nkaa no so mu
ne nsɛmpa no ahyɛse.": ama maakɛka asɛm no wɔ hɔ so

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔkɔr hɔn nhyiamudan a ɔwɔ Galilii nyina mu kɛkaa asɛm no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na otuu mbɔnsam."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na kwatanyi bi baa no hɔ bɛserɛɛ no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: bɔkotoow no
column6: ibotum dɛ ema mo ho san."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na Jesus ne yamu hyehyee no maa no
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na ɔtseen ne nsa dze kaa no

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ntsɛmara na kwata no fii no ho
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ma no ho sanee."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na Jesus braa no dzendzenndzen
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: na ɔmaa ofii hɔ ntsɛmara
column6: "Hwɛ ma aannka biribi annkyerɛ obiara; na san kɔ
column8: na w'ahosan ntsi kotua dza Moses hyɛe no fa yɛ dase ma hɔn."

"Jesus Kraest: "Na ɔno dze
[Nyankopɔn Ba] no: ɔdze kɛtahyee pii
"#1.1 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi mmfa Nyank: ma dɛm ntsi Jesus enntum annkɔ kurow bi mu petee bio
column6: mbom sar do hɔ beebi na ɔtsenae; na wofii mbea nyina baa ne nkyɛn."
